ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank all medical staff of the Krasnoyarsk Regional Center for Prevention and Control of AIDS for their assistance in sampling. The results of part 1 (HIV-1 drug resistance, HIV-1 pol gene subtype-specific polymorphism) were obtained within the framework of Russian Science Foundation (Research Project no. 16-15-10238). The results of part 2 (HIV-1 diversity) were obtained within the framework of State Research and Development Program 2-16.
